detail.author: author
detail.notificationBody: A pull request event occurred in the following AWS CodeCommit repository: myRepo. arn:aws:sts::123456789012:assumed-role/Admin/user made the following PullRequest 1. The pull request was created with the following information: Pull Request ID as 1 and title as example title. For more information, go to the AWS CodeCommit console https://us-east-1.console.aws.amazon.com/codesuite/codecommit/repositories/myRepo/pull-requests/1?region=us-east-1
detail.title: example title
